attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In a callous mis course of justice, health and safety have declared the removal of the Microwave from Steve Thompson's office.  The microwave forms a key part of his specialist diet of Egg and Hearts.  Other offices in the building have been able to keep their George Foreman Grill. Please join us on the quest to revoke the decision and keep the Microwave.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
